Text: Holiday Specials from HawaiitropicalscomAloha Youre receiving this newsletter because you are a valued customer or free tropical flower contestant of hawaiitropicalscom If you do not wish to receive updates about our products and services reply with not interested and well remove your name from our mailing list Please be sure you send your removal request with the email address that you or other persons using your account entered our contest with Its Not To Late for Christmas We have two gorgeous tropical gift boxes fresh from Costa Rica ready to send from Miami for delivery to most areas including the East Coast on Monday Dec Just in time for CHRISTMAS Orders must be in by pm today Hawaii Time which is pm for the East Coast Order now Arturos Pineapple Ginger Christmas Mix We have made special arrangements with one of the highest quality growers of tropical flowers in Costa Rica to send this novelty mix to the mainland US just in time for Christmas Each gift box consists of miniature Pineapple Ananas premium vibrant red Gingers French Kiss Costas Whaleback palm Phoenix Palm variegated Shell Ginger leaves and Ti leaves Christmas Arturos Pineapple Ginger Mix Sale price valdaypinginhtml Christmas Red Ginger Mix Also from Costa Rica in time for Christmas is the Red Ginger Mix Each holiday gift box consists of premium vibrant red Gingers assorted Ti leaves and Areca palms Christmas Red Ginger Mix Sale price valdayredginhtml Mahalo Robert Holt Aina Hawaiian Tropical Products E Kawailani Street Hilo Hawaii Toll Free

Holiday Specials from HawaiitropicalscomPST Aloha Youre receiving this newsletter because you are a valued customer or free tropical flower contestant of hawaiitropicalscom If you do not wish to receive updates about our products and services reply with not interested and well remove your name from our mailing list Please be sure you send your removal request with the email address that you or other persons using your account entered our contest with News Flash from Hawaii Snow in Hawaii Snow on Mauna Kea January Photos by Steven Parente Throughout last weekend the Big Island was deluged with heavy rains high surf and cool temperatures reaching the low s in Hilo Brrrrrrr This late winter storm also brought heavy snowfall for Mauna Kea Mauna Kea translates into white mountain and as you view the shots youll understand why From the ocean floor this is the tallest mountain in the world There was a break today so I braved the cool Hilo morning temperatures low s went to Liliuokalani Gardens and took some shots of the beautiful view of Mauna Kea Hope you enjoy Steve Take a look picsofhawaiihtml We have some great new selections of potted orchids to look at as well Like the Chieftain Wild Warrior Orchid plant Winner of the American Orchid Societys Award of Merit this impressive plant with a mild fragrance similar to the stephanotis flower is NOW AVAILABLE The Chieftain Wild Warrior Orchid plant is a BrassiaOncidium mix POI Brscdm Each plant arrives in a pot and wicker basket Its inch blooms have a white center and yellowgreen petals that are long narrow with brown spots orchidplantshtml Mahalo Robert Holt Aina Hawaiian Tropical Products E Kawailani Street Hilo Hawaii Toll Free
